name: Indiana Boy Demo
description:
Buy Now full version https://norum82.itch.io/indiana-boy

INDIANA BOY

Relive a classic with a retro Gameboy-style graphics, in this puzzle game you will have to take the keys and open all the treasures. Think of every move you make, Take on mummies bats and snakes and bring the booty home.

Key Features : 

* Gameboy style pixel graphics

* think about your strategy to get the keys

* open all the treasures

* Take on mummies bats and snakes

* challenge your skills

CONTROLS

A : FOR ACTION MENU

A : FOR JUMP

S : FOR ATTACK

ARROWS : MOVE

I'm working to configure the pad :-) Thanks
